p: Coronaviruses are the largest group of viruses belonging to the Nidovirales order, which includes Coronaviridae, Arteriviridae, and Roniviridae families. The Coronaviridae are further divided into four groups: alpha, beta, gamma and delta coronaviruses [ 6â€“ 9]. SARS-CoV-2, belongs to the beta coronavirus cluster [ 6].
